items.title_original: The House of G.E.T.S.: A Practical Bypass for the Null-Byte Barrier
items.title_neutral: The House of G.E.T.S.: A Practical Bypass for the Null-Byte Barrier
items.excerpt: Modern secure coding "fixes" often replace one vulnerability with a more dangerous exploit primitive. This deep dive demonstrates how replacing strcpy() with a null-terminated gets() loop creates a "Zero'ed Wall" that can be bypassed using partial return address overwrites and PLT hijacking.
